description: After a refreshing summer beverage? Try this green smoothie recipe which uses fresh fruit and veg and is finished off with a zingy ginger and lime kick.
keywords: Smoothie & frapp√©,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Video,Sesame free,Summer,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Spinach,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Green Smoothie Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 400g honeydew melon, deseeded, peeled, roughly chopped
1 cm piece ginger, peeled, finely grated

recipeInstructions.text: Place melon, cucumber and banana in a blender. Blend for 1 minute or until almost smooth. Add spinach, lime juice, ginger and 1 cup of ice cubes, then blend until smooth and frothy. Serve sprinkled with lime zest.
